t:
This morning my amnesiac father had a heart attack.

Once in the ER, he asked my wife, “Have you informed your mother?”

“No Dad,” she replied,
           “your wife died a year back.”
c:
It's sad that my biological father had to know about his wife's death all over again, from my sister.





#father #heartattack #children #wife #incest #amnesia #death #hospital



Based on a partially true story.
